replies.bodyText: This would make sense if seeThrough had translucency enabled and the normal text layer didn't (in reality both do). However, the real difference is that seeThrough has depth test enabled, which implies that it's meant to be used in a 3D scene (as opposed to a 2D gui). The current name for this bool is purely naming related (ie. "give me the see_through layer instead of the normal one). If we want to redefine "seeThrough", it should in my opinion happen in a pure refactor PR that changes all instances of this naming scheme, not just in select places.
